idea:
A Young Consulting Team-Results driven by passion of our people
We are trusted advisors to our clients & share their aspirations and deliver true results
We serve FMCG startups and midsized companies to build strong footprint in Indian subcontinent- working with clients to embrace change in the dynamic market, shape winning strategies and drive execution towards reaching their highest potential through serving consumer’s needs and customer satisfaction. We advise companies on their most critical issues and opportunities: strategy, marketing, organization, operations.
We also build their capabilities and leadership skills at every level and every opportunity through Training, Coaching & Mentoring. We do this to help build internal support, get to real issues, and reach rational solutions to complex problems. We develop our clients to fully contribute in the process of building their organization’s profitable, sustainable business.
name: Smarketing Strategy Consulting

idea:

Our Social Enterprise Platform Products

It helps generate the organisation contribution to Global goals [SDG], country specific goals [Unnat Bharat Yogana] or Corporate CSR goals which are the vision and the mission specific easy to follow and track

idea:
Welcome to the Startup India profile page of 'The Ocean of Joy Music Marketing Company'. Our legal registered entity name is Sangeetham Ananda Sagaram Music Private Limited, which again means the same i.e. music is a never ending ocean of joy and we are here to spread music joy exponentially.

Our envisaged operations include an events aggregator, music promotion consulting services, etc. among others.

Though we got incorporated only on 29 Sep 2018, we began giving back to the music community way before that, through our CSR initiative under the label Underprivileged Musicians. This is an initiative to support poor or disabled talented musicians with their music promotion free of cost. Check www.UnderprivilegedMusicians.com  and www.youtube.com/UnderprivilegedMusicians for more details.
name: Sangeetham Ananda Sagaram Music Private Limited
